___PayloadIdentifier.description: A unique identifier for the payload, dot-delimited.  Usually root PayloadIdentifier+subidentifier

___Comment.description: This string will appear in the System Policy UI. If it is missing, “PayloadDisplayName” or “PayloadDescription” will be put into this field before the rule is added to the System Policy database.

___PayloadType.description: The type of the payload, a reverse dns string

___PayloadOrganization.description: This value describes the issuing organization of the profile, as displayed to the user

___Requirement.description: The policy requirement. This key must follow the syntax described in Code Signing Requirement Language.

___PayloadVersion.description: The version of the whole configuration profile.

___Expiration.description: An expiration date for rule(s) being processed.
